summary: This mod replace all ore and ingots textures in Skyrim by new HD ones.
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------
HD ORE AND INGOTS BY BIOPROD
----------------------------------------

----------------
DESCRIPTION 
----------------

This mod replace all ore and ingots textures in Skyrim by new HD ones.

(resolution : Ore : 1024x512 Ingots : 1024x1024)

Feedback is always welcome, endorse if you like it !

Let me know if you have some request or if you find any issue with this mod.

-----------------
INSTALLATION 
-----------------

MANUAL INSTALLATION :

1- Choose the main file .

2- Unzip to a temporary location.

3- There is two folder named \"ORE HD\" and \"INGOTS HD\". Choose the one you want or both and open it/them. 

4- extract included \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim directory and overwrite if necessary. 

(Don\'t forget to back up your files if you don\'t wanna loose them) It\'s done !


NEXUS MOD MANAGER INSTALLATION :

Choose the optional file .


-------------
UNINSTALL 
-------------

Just remove all the files listed below from your data/textures/clutter folder :

ingotcorundum01.dds
ingotdwarven01.dds
ingotebony01.dds
ingotgold01.dds
ingotiron01.dds
ingotmoonstone01.dds
ingotobsidian01.dds
ingotorichalcum01.dds
ingotquicksilver01.dds
ingotsilver01.dds
ingotsteel01.dds
orecorundum01_n.dds
orecorundum01.dds
oreebony01_n.dds
oreebony01.dds
oregold01_n.dds
oregold01.dds
oreiron01_n.dds
oreiron01.dds
oremoonstone01_n.dds
oremoonstone01.dds
oreobsidian01_n.dds
oreobsidian01.dds
oreorichalcum01_n.dds
oreorichalcum01.dds
orequicksilver01_n.dds
orequicksilver01.dds
oresilver01_n.dds
oresilver01.dds

-----------------
REQUIREMENT 
-----------------

The Elder Scroll V : SKYRIM

---------------------
INCOMPATIBILITY 
---------------------

NONE
author: BioProd
